name: Sweet Potato and Avocado Salad
author: mamameg
summary: My favorite quick-and-easy go-to lunch! So delicious, also makes the perfect side dish! I have never actually measured any of the ingredients, I just make it the way I like it. This is a really simple recipe where you can just add the ingredients to taste. I'm a busy mom and this is something quick I usually make for my lunch everyday. You could also serve this as a tasty side dish.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt-free seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®)
directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add sweet potato, cover, and steam until tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Place avocado in a bowl; add olive oil, salt-free seasoning blend, garlic powder, and black pepper and stir to coat
Gently stir sweet potato into avocado mixture; top with Parmesan cheese
